verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of praise. <S%H8426><s%> Make a joyful noise to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you lands. <S%H776><s%>
Serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with gladness: <S%H8057><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with singing. <S%H7445><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> you that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> he is God: <S%H430><s%> it is he that has made <S%H6213><s%> us, and not we ourselves; <S%H587><s%> we are his people, <S%H5971><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of his pasture. <S%H4830><s%>

Enter <S%H935><s%> into his gates <S%H8179><s%> with thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and into his courts <S%H2691><s%> with praise: <S%H8416><s%> be thankful <S%H3034><s%> to him, and bless <S%H1288><s%> his name. <S%H8034><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%> and his truth <S%H530><s%> endures to all generations. <S%H1755><s%>
